confidence_then_consistency.probleme: Missed 'easy' shots due to loss of confidence
confidence_then_consistency.diagnostic: Loss of confidence leading to slight guidance instead of subconscious control

debutant: Remember making the shot in the past and what it felt like

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice the shot without conscious control, focusing on subconscious training

erreurs_a_eviter: Don't worry about missing a shot; focus on previous successes
